item.title: Don’t automate your life
item.description: TLDR; Don’t automate your life. Technology has evolved to the point to where it is almost possible to do just that. We rely on computers to think for us too much. It is causing our minds to atrophy. Spend your time learning and contributing to the world instead of constantly entertaining yourself. Remembering Phone Numbers When I was a teenager, I could remember a telephone number like my wife now remembers my every mistake.
